Text: Hey mirrormaster82 nice uploads.  I got a question. I wanted to try scanning a comic book to see how to do it. I scanned a comic book and it's only 23 pages long but the file is 37.1MB big.  I see how most of your single issues are below 20MB.  Anyways It turned out good and I have it in .cbr format and can read it with Comic Rack just fine.  Just curious how the pros do it.  Thanks for the uploads.  I just recently got back into comics. Your uploads help me to catch up on stories I have missed.
Just google it,I'm sure there are some programs that reduce size without reducing quality of the scan.And,I'm not a scanner,I just upload stuff,although I have scanned few comics myself...
Abby fine reader is a good scan program...

To mirror master82
thanks for this upload and many,many others you have uploaded. thanks again!!!
